languages.text: {n}К'тан желает Быть. К'тан созданы для того, чтобы распространяться и покорять. Не пребывать заточенным в пределах Не-Когда, где Его спрятали от бытия презренные разумные инструменты. К'тан желает вознестись, утолить голод и продолжить прерванное — чистую радость освоения и укрощения реальности.{/n}

{n}The C'tan wishes to Be. All C'tan exist to spread and conquer, not to stay manacled within untime, where It was entombed by the contemptible sentient tools, away from all that is. The C'tan wishes to ascend, sate Its hunger, and embrace once more the pure exhilaration of claiming and taming reality.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}К'тан желает Быть. К'тан созданы для того, чтобы распространяться и покорять. Не пребывать заточенным в пределах Не-Когда, где Его спрятали от бытия презренные разумные инструменты. К'тан желает вознестись, утолить голод и продолжить прерванное — чистую радость освоения и укрощения реальности.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}C'Tan wishes to Be. C'Tan are born to spread around and conquer — not to stay imprisoned within the No-Where, where He was put by the despicable sentient tools, away from the living. C'Tan wishes to ascend, sate His hunger and continue where He left off — feeling the pure joy of conquering and simplifying the reality.{/n}

{n}C'Tan wishes to Be. C'Tan are born to spread around and conquer — not to stay imprisoned within the No-Where, where He was put by the despicable sentient tools, away from the living. C'Tan wishes to ascend, sate His hunger and continue where He left off — feeling the pure joy of conquering and simplifying the reality.{/n}

{n}The C'Tan wishes to Be. The is born to spread around and conquer, not to stay manacled within the No-Where, where He was put by the despicable sentient tools, away from the living. The C'Tan wishes to ascend, sate His hunger, and pick up where He left off, feeling the pure joy of conquering and simplifying the reality.{/n}

The C'Tan wishes to ascend, sate His hunger, and pick up where He left off, feeling the pure joy of conquering and simplifying the reality.{/n}

{n}The C'tan wishes to Be. All C'tan exist to spread and conquer, not to stay manacled within untime, where It was entombed by the contemptible sentient tools, away from all that is. The C'tan wishes to ascend, sate Its hunger, and embrace once more the pure exhilaration of claiming and taming reality.{/n}

The C'tan wishes to ascend, sate Its hunger, and embrace once more the pure exhilaration of claiming and taming reality.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le C'tan veut exister. Il est né pour se répandre et conquérir, pas pour rester emprisonné dans le néant où il a été jeté par d'abjects outils intelligents, loin de tout ce qui existe. Le C'tan veut s'élever, assouvir sa faim et connaître à nouveau l'euphorie pure que l'on éprouve en subjuguant la réalité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The C'tan wishes to Be. All C'tan exist to spread and conquer, not to stay manacled within untime, where It was entombed by the contemptible sentient tools, away from all that is. The C'tan wishes to ascend, sate Its hunger, and embrace once more the pure exhilaration of claiming and taming reality.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le C'tan veut exister. Il est né pour se répandre et conquérir, pas pour rester emprisonné dans le néant où il a été jeté par d'abjects outils intelligents, loin de tout ce qui existe. Le C'tan veut s'élever, assouvir sa faim et connaître à nouveau l'euphorie pure que l'on éprouve en subjuguant la réalité.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El C'tan desea Existir. Existe para expandirse y conquistar, no para estar encerrado en el no tiempo, donde Lo aprisionaron sus nauseabundas herramientas conscientes, lejos de todo. El C'tan desea trascender, saciar Su hambre y disfrutar una vez más del placer puro de conquistar y simplificar la realidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The C'tan wishes to Be. All C'tan exist to spread and conquer, not to stay manacled within untime, where It was entombed by the contemptible sentient tools, away from all that is. The C'tan wishes to ascend, sate Its hunger, and embrace once more the pure exhilaration of claiming and taming reality.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El C'Tan desea Existir. Ha nacido para expandirse y conquistar, no para estar encerrado en la Nada, donde lo aprisionaron sus nauseabundas herramientas conscientes, lejos de los vivos. El C'Tan desea trascender, saciar Su hambre y continuar donde lo dejó, disfrutando del placer puro de conquistar y simplificar la realidad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}星神渴望存在。祂存在的目的就是四处扩散，不断征服。祂不想被困在这狭窄的牢笼里，沦为其他人手中可鄙的工具，远离真正的生命。星神渴望擢升，渴望满足饥渴。祂想再次沉浸于驯服、扭曲真实世界带来的纯粹喜悦。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The C'tan wishes to Be. All C'tan exist to spread and conquer, not to stay manacled within untime, where It was entombed by the contemptible sentient tools, away from all that is. The C'tan wishes to ascend, sate Its hunger, and embrace once more the pure exhilaration of claiming and taming reality.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}星神渴望存在。祂存在的目的就是四处扩散，不断征服。祂不想被困在这狭窄的牢笼里，沦为其他人手中可鄙的工具，远离真正的生命。星神渴望擢升，渴望满足祂的饥渴。祂想继续之前中断的旅程，感受征服星界，改变现实世界带来的纯粹快乐。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der C'tan möchte Sein. Alle C'tan existieren, um sich zu vermehren und zu erobern. Sie verharren nicht in der Unzeit, in der Es von verachtenswerten fühlenden Werkzeugen fern von allem Sein begraben wurde. Der C'tan will aufsteigen, Seinen Hunger stillen und erneut das reine Hochgefühl spüren, wenn er die Realität an sich reißt und bezähmt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The C'tan wishes to Be. All C'tan exist to spread and conquer, not to stay manacled within untime, where It was entombed by the contemptible sentient tools, away from all that is. The C'tan wishes to ascend, sate Its hunger, and embrace once more the pure exhilaration of claiming and taming reality.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der C'tan wünscht zu SEIN. Er wurde geboren, um sich auszubreiten und zu erobern, nicht um im Nirgend-Wo gefesselt zu bleiben, wohin in die verabscheuenswürdigen denkenden Werkzeuge gebracht haben, fern von allen Lebenden. Der C'tan will aufsteigen, seinen Hunger stillen, und dort weitermachen, wo er aufgeführt hat, er will die reine Freude der Eroberung spüren, der Vereinfachung der Realität.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ク＝タンは存在することを望む。それは広がり、征服するために生まれたのであり、卑しい感覚的な道具によって、すべてから遠ざけられた、時もない場所に縛り付けられたままではいられないのだ。ク＝タンは昇天し、飢えを満たし、現実を征服し単純化する純粋な喜びをもう一度味わうことを望んでいるのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The C'tan wishes to Be. All C'tan exist to spread and conquer, not to stay manacled within untime, where It was entombed by the contemptible sentient tools, away from all that is. The C'tan wishes to ascend, sate Its hunger, and embrace once more the pure exhilaration of claiming and taming reality.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ク＝タンは存在することを望む。彼は様々な場所に散らばって征服するために生まれたのであり、卑劣な道具によって、生者から遠ざけられた「どこでもない場所」に縛り付けられたままではいられないのだ。ク＝タンは昇天し、飢えを満たし、現実を征服し単純化する純粋な喜びを感じながら、彼が去った場所に戻ることを望む。{/n}

languages.text: {n}C'tan, var olmak istiyor. C'tan; yayılmak ve fethetmek için vardır, kendisinin alçak fâni araçlar tarafından var olandan uzağa gömüldüğü zamansızlık içinde zincirlenmek için değil. C'tan; yükselmek, açlığını dindirmek ve gerçekliği ele geçirip onu ehlîleştirmenin saf heyecanını bir kez daha yaşayabilmek istiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The C'tan wishes to Be. All C'tan exist to spread and conquer, not to stay manacled within untime, where It was entombed by the contemptible sentient tools, away from all that is. The C'tan wishes to ascend, sate Its hunger, and embrace once more the pure exhilaration of claiming and taming reality.{/n}
